name: Value
description:
This was completed as a final project for a class last semester. I wanted to portray human emotion using color theory as a means of connecting the two. It was born out of the self-discovery I had back then, and I wrote it with the intention of taking the player through the conflicting emotions I had during that time. It was a time of hope and hopelessness for me, and although it seems like a paradox, the experience I had was real.

To those struggling with self-discovery: I hope this helps you on your own road to happiness.
